Name: Wordsmith
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum
22.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Punchy pot-still rum with equally powerful Green Chartreuse supported by maraschino liqueur with lime zestiness. Powerful in every respect. (Perhaps split serve between two in Nick & Nora glasses.)
History: A riff on a Last Word created in 2009 by Chuck Taggart, Los Angeles and named by Dave Stolte. See: Last Word history
Nutrition: One serving of Wordsmith contains 202 calories
